        public byte[] getEncryptedPayload()

      • encryptPayload

        public void encryptPayload(ConfidentialityAlgorithm confidentialityAlgorithm)
                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Encrypts getPayloadData().
        Parameters:
        confidentialityAlgorithm - ConfidentialityAlgorithm to be used to encrypt payload data.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - - when confidentiality algorithm fails.
        See Also:
        getEncryptedPayload()
